creator: c.meisinger@livingliquid.com
text:
we use an include file for our virtual hosts.
in every <VirtualHost> we include another file.
this worked great before apache 1.3.35.
with 1.3.35 apache doesn't start anymore.
error message:
Syntax error on line 27 of /usr/local/apache/conf/test_access_CA.include.conf:
Missing </VirtualHost> directive at end-of-file
/etc/init.d/apachectl start: httpd could not be started

sooo... let's have a look at the changelog of 1.3.35:
core: Allow usage of the "Include" configuration directive within
     previously "Include"d files.

well what did you fixed???
include file inside include file always worked. at least for us.

creator: jorton@redhat.com
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 39490 ***

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text: This in fact is a duplicate of bug 39516 - not the wildcard includes fault.
